name: Squid Inc (OliverMatheGames)
description:
Squid Inc is a fun, tactile and juicy 2D action platformer where you  have to weave your way through a series of levels avoiding the dangers of the deep sea such as crabs, jellyfish, spikes and the most dangerous thing of all SHARKS!!! 

How To Play:

Click the left mouse button and drag away from character, the farther away you drag the more force the squid will have when you release the button and watch him go flying

Press "Esc" to exit

Press "R" to restart

Credits:

All art assets are made and owned by hEcK Studios

All coding was done by hEcK Studios

Attribution:
